name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where a PowerShell script was used by an attacker to drop a malicious file onto multiple hosts.

parallel--4c1f2d0c-3ebd-44eb-8c0e-29f6f0.name: Concurrently Mitigate Attacks
parallel--4c1f2d0c-3ebd-44eb-8c0e-29f6f0.description: Simultaneously execute processes to kill malicious scripts and remove malicious files.

action--5a1f560e-8ff4-4c97-9ba5-007505e6.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--5a1f560e-8ff4-4c97-9ba5-007505e6.description: Terminate all suspicious PowerShell processes running on affected hosts.

loop--d0cf6f36-4335-403d-9193-b975357b45.name: Remove malicious files
loop--d0cf6f36-4335-403d-9193-b975357b45.description: Iterate over each malicious file detected and remove it forcefully.

action--d0cf6f36-4335-403d-9193-b975357b.name: Remove malicious file from infected hosts
action--d0cf6f36-4335-403d-9193-b975357b.description: Forcefully delete identified malicious files from infected hosts.

loop--c980eb2b-f630-4e09-9645-d857c667f3.name: Scan network for additional infections
loop--c980eb2b-f630-4e09-9645-d857c667f3.description: Perform a network scan for infections until the scan returns clean.

action--c980eb2b-f630-4e09-9645-d857c667.name: Start network scan
action--c980eb2b-f630-4e09-9645-d857c667.description: Initiate a network scan across the given range to detect threats.

network_scan_clean.description: Indicates whether the network scan result is clean.

action--f3278c6f-2a3d-4afe-bf23-3c130fb5.name: Update security policies to block script execution
action--f3278c6f-2a3d-4afe-bf23-3c130fb5.description: Set execution policy to prevent script execution, thereby mitigating further attacks.
